Now i am a server and have been for quite some time and never in my life have i gotten or gave such horrible service.  They need to work on team work there. if you see some one sitting there help them. Now i will go back because i love the food but i will not sit in the bar area.

If you know me, then you know I am a fan of the Red Robin franchise. The two that I frequent the most is the Redlands location and also, the Rancho Cucamonga location. Before this location opened the closest Red Robin to me was the Redlands location, so you can say I was a bit excited when I saw the big RR banner outside the Galleria at Tyler.  The boyfriend and I visited this location during noon yesterday and it was pretty busy. There were an abundance of greeters at the door; however, they weren't really helpful at getting us seated. The hostess that directed us to our seats seemed confused as to where to sit us. She finally sat us in the corner booth of the bar that was of the utmost difficulty to get into since it was right next to someone's chair. From then on, it wasn't too bad.  Our waitress was kinda awkward, but she was nice. However, we saw another waiter who spent more than a good few minutes chatting up a customer and avoiding his other tables. The food tasted the same compared to other RR's. The restaurant itself was sort of small. All in all, I'd rather drive to the Redlands location and enjoy the atmosphere and company there.

We went to the new Red Robin at the Galleria at Tyler for their opening night, It is in the spot formerly occupied by TGI Fridays, before they moved into their new digs.  Its great to finally have Red Robin in Riverside.  Great service, and great food! I had the Burnin' Love burger, which was delicious, but not as good as the 5-Alarm Burger it replaced. It was perfectly cooked, and very tasty. My friend had a glass with a chip in it, but the server whisked it away and replaced it, and the manager came right over to say how sorry he was. It was busy, being their opening night, but the service was spot-on, and our drinks never went empty.

I wish I could give a negative stars. Fries are cold stale and old. No refills on drinks and fries. I didn't leave a tip because they didn't deserve it.  I will never go back. This is the second time i have had terrible service there.

Great Burgers, great service, great value. I would recommend it to anyone. If you haven't tried Red Robin, you should. You will be glad you did! I love the Bleu Ribbon burger, but the whiskey burger and chili burger are great too.

Tried this place around Victoria Gardens, but they just placed another Red Robin in Tyler next to Ruby's. However, you can only access Red Robin through the outside. Service: This place was pretty crowded, but my friend and I were seated instantly. Hostess opened the door walking in and out. How many diners do that, seriously? Waitress was so nice and came back to check up on my friend and I. She was definitely happy, cheerful, and helpful. Drink: Ordered the special (alcoholic). It was super strong, but I didn't really drink too much of it, so I didn't really mind. Non-alcoholic: Strawberry lemonade is delicious! Recommend Food: Bottomless fries are so yummy, especially with the special seasoning. My friend and my food came out pretty quickly.  Ordered- Guacamole Bacon burger: So good and not too messy. Guacamole was okay (had better), but the meat was very juicy. Simple Burger: Simple, but still very good. Towering onion rings: OMG so yummy and it's so pretty! Don't remember what else I ordered or what my friends ordered :( Will come here for happy hour another day.
For such a small amount of time to eat and still expecting a great meal, red robin did that and beyond. Perfect service from the whole crew and nothing wrong could be found
Bottomless fries for the hungry and decent burgers overall. Can't go wrong with that.

I have been here several times now and each time has been great! i have 2 Pit Bulls that are almost 2 years old now but are still big puppies. We always sit on the porch since we have the dogs. Every time we have great service and even extra service because the staff loves to come out and play with the dogs. I also love the rewards card. If you go 10 times you get a cupon and i have already been 7 times. i will continue eating at this location. Thanks for being so dog friendly!
Great burgers, amazing fries, and friendly environment.  It's close to home and that's plus. They are always fast and quick. I have no complaints yet..

I never give bad reviews and always try to see the good but I can't in this place. I have come in here twice and both times left hungry. I came here with my boyfriend both times and we wanted a simple table for two. We sat there waiting for over 40 minutes each time and watched them seat huge parties over us. Both times I simply asked for an estimated wait time and they told us they didn't know and that we had to wait because they were busy. Literally one moment later they seated a party of 8 the second they came in. They then proceeded to make excuses as to why we could not be accommodated. We left without a word the first time. The second time I told them to cancel my table because waiting an hour to be seated and watching so many people being served over us was beyond ridiculous. Only then did they magically "find a table" but I was already too upset to stay. They were quite frankly very rude, made many excuses and I never even got so far as to the table.
It is what it is, dont expect me to come here unless its super convenient and really hungry!

Been there more then a few times and I like there Riverside Burger and Steak fries, then the Bottomless drinks they offer and had a few other Burgers and NEVER been disappointed with any Burger and they have Great service and the managers will also visit your table, at least they have mine Every Time I've been there with out requesting them, just to make sure all going well. They may cost more then your average burger, but you Diffently  get your money's worth, and oh if you like like onion rings try there version, trust me you won't be disappointed and All drinks and side dishes and bottomless. One satisfied customer Every time I've been there.

Yes, 5 stars!  Hey, this is Red Robin, you are not expecting Spago BUT the hostess and wait staff really pay attention to your needs.  The food is quality, never cold, and again the staff and crew is attentive to your needs.   We came to this restaurant after a horrible experience being seated at Cheesecake Factory, and Red Robin has again won me over.  Sumptuous portions, and you want a specific side order replacement with extra features/cheese, not a problem!  Although covered with many televisions, they are not blaring and you can have a conversation with your dinner guest without lip reading.

There are few times when I can remember service so poor but this place stands out. I really can't say it was one waitress because we had one take our drink order one take our food order and another bring us the check. All 3 must have attended the same training seminar because all 3 were forgetful, slow, and seemed to care less wether or not we would ever be back which my family and I have decided we will not. Not to mention when did we as a society start paying $90.00 to feed four people fast food quality burgers under the blanket of some odd nostalgic flavor we were unable to put a label on? Is it a mix between vintage 50's style bugers or a Hard Rock Cafe feel? Whichever it is we were not impressed.
Always a great day with buffalo clucks and fries. The service was slightly slow the day I went and it wasn't that busy but they were courteous and the food was good so what else can you really say?

Great location right in front of the Tyler Mall. The staff is great - we were told a 15 minute wait for our party of 6 and were happily surprised when we were able to sit much sooner during their busy lunch time. Our waitress filled our drinks at the perfect time and brought out different dipping sauces for our bottomless fries (the campfire dip and sweet and spicy ketchup were our faves). Would recommend their peppercorn burger if your looking for something delicious!

Clean and nice place. By the mall so perfect place to eat after shopping. Awesome burgers and better than that is the French fries which is unlimited (yes! Unlimited!!) Sandwiches are good. Some of the best onion rings. Bar is nice. Good choice of drinks. Fast and very nice and friendly service.

Just left, about to go to Olive Garden across the street instead. I was standing there like an idiot for minutes without anyone even greeting me or saying they will be right with me. Unacceptable so I left.

On our first visit there was a misunderstanding with my friends free birthday burger. We spoke with the manager, Tammy, and she was more than helpful. We appreciate you Tammy. You are a lovely and gracious asset to Red Robin and we will return the next time we are in the area.

Had a bad experience at this located.. They lost my ticket and my food didn't come for a while. They did try to alleviate the issue by giving me free fries as an appetizer. Once the food came the order was wrong, but I did not even bother complaining at this point. Still a fan of Red Robin, but not this location.
Service was great, and, as always, the food was better than satisfying. I would recommend.

Food is worth the price, best burgers I've ever had from anywhere.  Although most times I come here the service is really slow, last time I ordered it took them 25 minutes to bring my burger. Other then that, this is a pretty good place to eat at.

I placed a to go order so ready to eat the delicious food I ordered until I got it . They obviously don't care about the preparation of to go orders. Fries were stale and not seasoned, and my Burger was not made how I asked. So disappointed. I should have went with my first mind, and went to islands. If you want a good experience go in & dine. Do not place phone orders!

First time visiting RR new location in riverside and it will be my LAST! Service was horrible.Our waitress was in training being trained by an idiot. My boyfriend order appetizer at 1st to see if it was even worth staying...we order plan buffalo wings with sauce on the side AND IT WAS MORE LIKE BURNT CHICKEN WINGS WITH A SIDE OF vinegar mix with tabasco sauce. So I thought maybe the meals would be more appealing ordering a BBQ burger and my boyfriend order a caesar wrap with a side of COLD FRYS!!!!!! That did bothered us ,but  as a paying customer what  bothered me even more is that we had 2 waitress and not once did they check up on us concern if I needed a drink refill, messed up our order by never adding our mac N cheese that was ordered  from the beginning  of our order. Even worse It just wasn't just  my party ,but the table in front of us experience horrible service as well with a messed up order/bad service. Honestly as much as they charge I was better off going to TGIF at least I would of had a real dine in experience unlike RR wasting my time/money. I DON'T RECOMMEND THIS RIVERSIDE LOCATION TO ANYONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Haven't been to red robin since back in the day. Food quality has gone down. I got cold fries and Taylor( our server)  was too busy. Too many choices w better quality food and better service. Won't be back.

Came here once during Dec. for dinner and was totally ignored by all of the passing employees at the front door.  A manager finally noticed and instead of asking one of her employees to help ,seated my group of 4 herself.  Once seated we were totally ignored for another 10 minutes before we got up and left.                         A gluten for punishment ,returned again in March for dinner to see if the experience could be any better.  Not ignored ,waited 30 minutes to be seated .The waitress was nice      however she forgot to bring out our requested dipping sauce.  She also apparently forgot to put in our burger requests of "well done "and "no pink" because both burgers had a large amount of pink throughout. Our first basket of fries was delivered cold as was one of the entrees.  The waitress did ask if we wanted a to go cup for a soda.  Red Robin as a chain usually doesn't fail to impress me. This one did.

Gluten-free food at a burger restaurant, who would have thought? Didn't know until today that Red Robin was carrying gluten-free buns for their burgers. Love that they have taken family-friendly seriously to include even families with special dietary needs.

Three stars because of so-so food quality. Service was great when we dined in but would no recommend ordering to go. When we ordered to go our containers were half full and we got tiny portions. Not okay when you've ordered chili con queso and have enough chips for one person if that.

The staff at this location is always so nice and friendly! The other day I went and ordered a bacon burger! It was so tasty and good! There bottomless fries are amazing!!! Especially with the red robin seasoning! Yummy! There freckled lemonade is also so tasty and refreshing! You should try it! Definitely one of my favorite places to eat!

THIS PLACE SUCKS!   The food is mediocre and the service is AWFUL!!!!   There are a lot of 20 something chicks with chips on their shoulders.... I blame Management for not letting employees know what is expected of them!  You walk in and are ignored!  Then you get adolescent back talking from the help... also argumentative with customers and they can't get your order right even when there are 2 of them taking your order!   If you like so so food and like getting treated like poop then go for it.  This is mostly for 20 something guys that need to get out of the house, grad a burger and watch tv while eating...  NOT FOR PEOPLE WITH ANY SOPHISTICATION OR STANDARDS!!!  My predictions is with service like this they will be out of business very soon!  With the economy what it is and  restaurants going under everywhere, I would be bending over backwards NOT to PISS OFF ANY CUSTOMERS that are paying you good money.  THEY DO NOT GET IT HERE!!!  Will NOT RETURN and DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!

Very few bad experiences here. Sometimes the parking can be hard and walking up to the restaurant can be like playing forger in real life. Great burgers the wait staff goes out of their way to make it an enjoyable experience. I usually only eat half the burger get another serving of bottomless fries and have a meal for latter and keep the calorie count down. They also will give you a soda and sauces to go ( Mmmmm campfire sauce ) . The whiskey river and DGB are favorites and the mud pie is way to much for any sane person but great to share! Although they were good it's no wonder the Ruby's a few doors down went out of business. Good food, good service, good price!

Tried twice and both times some items was undercooked and the rest was over cooked. $12 Atlantic cod fish and chips were barely cooked past frozen & did not have any seasoning - will go to H Salt Fish & Chips next time. 10$ Hamburrger patty was cooked twice as long as it needed to be, was extremely well done & the consistency was like leather.  The fries were soggy - no wonder why they give you an unlimited amount as customers probably don't want a second serving after they taste the first round - advertising gimic.  The cole slaw was plain, again no seasoning, with large chuncks of cabbage.  I felt as if I was ripped off, will NEVER go back again & suggest that you stay away if possible.  Also, the manager, Deborah, was very rude when I complained about the food.  You can go next door to the Cheesecake Factory, spend the same amount of money, & get a great meal.
we just ate here today and the food was really good, i had Red's Big Tavern Burger while my husband had bleu ribbon, and staff are really nice esp. the one who is serving us, so friendly.

9/22/12 Seated right away on a Saturday evening. A/c worked really well, even made me wear my jacket but the hubby was fine. My burger was delicious. The fries were so yummy especially with their seasoning. All the employees were really nice. Got my free bday burger. The only drawback was that our appetizers came after I ate half of my burger but our waitress kept being very apologetic about it. The onion rings were crispy n decently battered as usual but our first time trying the fried zucchini and they were really good.

I absolutely love Red Robin and  I've been a fan for over 10 years, I moved to riverside a few years ago and I was thrilled when I saw one was opening near my home. I've been here 4x and every time I have a bad experience. Their customer service is horrible and all of the servers seem like they're  hating their life. The food is always cold, and today I was facing the kitchen area so I saw our onion rings just sitting there for 10-15 minutes, our burgers and fries were cold too! It was disgusting! I'll never go back again, I can just go to McDonalds to get the same quality food.
Love their burgers! Waitress was very friendly. She kept coming over to make sure we get refills. The wait for food was a bit longer than we want since we were on lunch break.

If you are ever at this location and Bree-Aan McDaniel seats or serves you, please tip her well! I left my iphone 5 on the table and she ran out into the parking lot of the Tyler galleria and chased us down to give me my phone back. There are very few people this honest and compassionate. I didn't even get to thank her properly due to that fact that I was in absolute shock. She is amazing, make it known.
I always get my usual when I come here. California Chicken Sandwich or Crispy Chicken Sandwich baffalo style. The service is usually very good and the wait is never too bad.
Customer service was great. Our waitress was very attentive and, we did not have to wait a long time on refills because she made sure we were always

Always a great spot to eat...ALways the Best burgers, until proven different.  Account for price, location, service, and taste.  RED ROBIN wins all the time.  Service was ok, not the best, but never the worse.  I tried some special beer they had that night with ice cream in it.  Fucking right!?   it was pretty dern good...if my country ass dont say so muh self...

I was contacted by the restaurant manager probably 2-3 days after the incident. She was very concerned with the quality of service my family and I had received. I explained everything to her in detail. She apologized numerous times and offered to have us back. Service was a lot better. I said in my review that it was not the quality of the food as that has always been great. my complaint was with the service provided to us by our waitress. it really shows that Red Robin and its management team are serious about their service. I will say that they had no knowledge of us re-visiting. I guess anyone can have a bad day. All is forgiven.

This is a really small red robin. Service was good, but I kind of wish she brought out more than one basket of fries for 6 people, considering she had to eventually bring out 3 more baskets. The food was totally normal for a red robin. I still love my whiskey river bbq burger.
Really good food and you have to like the bottomless fries. The line was pretty long so we went to the bar area of the restaurant and were able to be seated right away.
Like most restaurants, the food is consistent and always delicious. I am glad they built one closer to home, here in Riverside. Highly recommended!

The only reason this place gets 2 stars is because of the food. The service is atrocious (aside from Saylor, the hostess, who was super friendly). We were seated right next to the kitchen and proceeded to sit for 10 minutes without a drink order, despite the fact our waitress came to the table right next to us twice (she had a total of 3 tables, including ours). Finally after announcing loudly we would like a drink, a manager rushed over from behind the wall and took our order. Our waitress still did not appear for another 5min. I ordered a cup of soup to start then a wrap. Bet you can guess what happened next! Our meals came out with no soup in site. I told the runner she could cancel the soup and shortly later our waitress came by to say they removed it. A few moments after that, the manager came and dropped off the soup! I didn't touch it. Our waitress only came by again to ask if we were done then left to get the check without taking our dirty plates. Needless to say, I didn't leave and tip and noted on the receipt that the zero was indicative of her service. We won't be back; I am so disappointed that this location represents Red Robin

Early dinner with my wife - I had the Sea Scatter (I think that's what it was called) and she had the spicy burger (don't remember the name).  The drinks were potent, the fish and clams were excellent, but the shrimp, although cooked properly, were breaded oddly - like a heavy breadcrumb, that I didn't care for.  The burger my wife had was good, but a one-time-only experience, is sort of how she described it.  Bottomless fries were excellent, my side of coleslaw was really yummy, if small.  We had a lot of fun - the place was only half full (except the walls were completely full of fun stuff to look at) and we had great service - our server was very lively, talkative and uber-friendly.

All I can say is this burger joint always hits the spot. Bottomless root beer float and bottomless fries always makes my meal! The service is great, even during a lunch rush. The waitress we had was super friendly and attend attenative. She made sure we were taken care of and happy. The burgers are amazing  and cooked just right!
Ate here recently with my family! I know this is a gourmet burger place, but I wish they offered more vegetarian options.The Garlic fries are delicious!  The waitress was very nice and attentive.

After an afternoon of shopping my friend and I decided to go to Red Robin for a late lunch. When we walked in we were immediately greeted by Saylor, the hostess, she is the ONLY reason why this place has two stars. She was extremely friendly and was quick to seat us. She even congratulated me on my pregnancy and made small talk about her child, which was sweet. When we sat at the table, we waiting a good 10 minutes before the manager heard me complain about not having anyone walk over to take our order and took it himself. After waiting a good 5 minutes for our drinks to arrive at the table, we waited at least 10 for our actual server to come take our food order. Our server completely forgot to bring the soup we ordered and we ended up asking for it to be removed from our bill. When our food arrived we were not impressed. Our sandwiches were greasy which made eating it not fun. The only good part of our meal were the fries and our drinks. We will NOT be returning to this restaurant ever again.

I'm a regular at red Robin and I have been for the past 15 years. I order the same thing all the time every time. And I always order a basket of fries while we wait for our food. For the first time in 15 years did a waitress have the audacity to tell me NO you cannot have a basket of fries. It's our restaurant policy that we don't give fries to waiting customers because we have a shortage of french fries and the fries are for people that order hamburgers or bottomless meals.  I couldn't believe what I was hearing. I even asked her a second time so you telling me I can't order food right now? She said you can order it but I won't bring it to you until all of your food is ready. Not only that but she was rude. I spoke to a manager and instantly the manager came apologetic to our table.  she said was so sorry & she doesn't know who trained the waitress but her information was very wrong. The manager apologized and said she would speak to the waitress on the correct policies and my basket of fries was brought out. Shame on the waitress for not even thinking twice about what she said I was literally ordering my food who does that, says no to a paying customer? So very very disappointed with this red Robin here in Riverside at Tyler mall. But I do thiank the manager for being apologetic.

Great place to eat! Good burgers and bottomless fries! The service is excellent. You can see managers walking around helping the servers which is great to see. Parking kind of sucks though, but it's a minor gripe.
Dirty Bird is the business!   Love the burgers and ayce fries...

Food was good as always; flavorful and speedy, just wish service was a little faster and prompt. Our server was friendly, just kinda felt like everything took a little longer than usual with him. Waited quite some time to be greeted. At one point we actually stopped eating for 10 minutes for him to check up on us so we could ask for refill fries.
Good selection of food,  great burgers
